text:
Hi, yes. It would appear so. Hope this doesn't put a wrinkle on things for you.
There is a form on the page, though, so you can schedule a technical consultation about it. That could help answer a lot of other questions you might have.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/reverse-proxy-support#request-a-consultation>

Hello! I am from SipSim, integration with our service is already posted in HubSpot Marketplace. Our integration works, but we want to improve it in the following way:

We want customers to be able to call using our sipsim service when clicking this button. Specifically, so that the call is made from the customer's mobile phone, and not through HubSpot. Neither the option of calling through the browser, nor the option of calling through the HubSpot app on the phone suits us. Specifically through the phone.

Basically all  we need to make it possible on our side is to get webhook with these fields:

1. caller
2. receiver
3. some kind of ID of client
Tell me please if that possible!
